name: Diva Sania- Elektronic Engineering student
description: I am a student at Politeknik Negeri Semarang majoring in Electrical Engineering, specializing in the D3-Electronics Engineering Program, with a GPA of 3.59. I am capable of working both independently and in a team, disciplined, responsible in carrying out tasks, quick to learn new things, and communicative. I possess skills in using engineering software such as Arduino IDE, Matlab, Proteus, Process Engineer, and Research and Development tools, as well as data analysis using Excel. I have a strong interest in various fields, particularly in IoT technology, automation, and hardware development. With a strong passion for learning and continuous improvement, I am ready to contribute optimally to technological advancement and innovation.
